thread.title: Mike Pence at CPAC: 'This Is Our Time ... America's ObamaCare Nightmare Is About to End'
thread.title_full: Mike Pence at CPAC: 'This Is Our Time ... America's ObamaCare Nightmare Is About to End'

title: Mike Pence at CPAC: 'This Is Our Time ... America's ObamaCare Nightmare Is About to End'
text:
Mike Pence at CPAC: 'This Is Our Time ... America's ObamaCare Nightmare Is About to End' Published February 23, 2017 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre 0 Email Print 
Fox News : 
Vice President Mike Pence sought to rally conservatives for the fight to repeal and replace ObamaCare Wednesday, telling a fired-up audience at CPAC Thursday that the health care law "has failed" and "must go." 
Pence's speech capped the first day of the annual conference, during which President Donald Trump's top aide warned activists not to "squander" GOP control of the White House and both Houses of Congress. 
"Our fight didnâ€™t end on [Election Day]," Pence said. "We won the day, but make no mistake about it. The harder work, the most important work, now lies ahead."
